page.title: 16The Lunesdale Civic Society.
page.content: The Lunesdale Civic Society exists to conserve Lunesdale's natural scenic beauty and historic buildings. Member- ship is open to all and is currently around 100 members. Lectures and visits are organised to places of beauty or historic interest and the society produces a quarterly news letter on subjects of local interest. Every year a major summer event is organised. These have included Art and Photographic exhibition and village history displays. One such event in the past covered the history of Melling. The 1985 event was an open gardens weekend,when 13 private households opened their gardens to the public. Amongst these were Town End House, Melling; Rose Cottage, Willow Cottage, Chapel House and The Orchard at Arkholme.
